args: $logDir='logs/copilot'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $logDir -Force | Out-Null; $event=[ordered]@{timestamp=(Get-Date).ToString('o'); event='session_start'; cwd=(Get-Location).Path}; $event | ConvertTo-Json -Compress | Add-Content -Path (Join-Path $logDir 'session.log'); Write-Host '[session-logger-lite] session start logged.'

$logDir='logs/copilot'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $logDir -Force | Out-Null; $event=[ordered]@{timestamp=(Get-Date).ToString('o'); event='session_end'}; $event | ConvertTo-Json -Compress | Add-Content -Path (Join-Path $logDir 'session.log'); Write-Host '[session-logger-lite] session end logged.'
